## Raw commands to compile and link

```batch
CL.exe /c /I. /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\sourcemod-1.7.2\public" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\sourcemod-1.7.2\public\sourcepawn" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\sourcemod-1.7.2\public\extensions" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\sourcemod-1.7.2\public\amtl" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\sourcemod-1.7.2\core\logic" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\mmsource-1.11.0.1143\core" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\mmsource-1.11.0.1143\core\sourcehook" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\public" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\public\vstdlib" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\public\engine" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\public\tier0" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\public\tier1" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\public\game\server" /I"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\game\shared" /Zi /nologo /W3 /WX- /diagnostics:column /O2 /Ot /Oy- /GL /D WIN32 /D NDEBUG /D _WINDOWS /D _USRDLL /D SDK_EXPORTS /D _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE /D SOURCEMOD_BUILD /D SOURCE_ENGINE=10 /D _WINDLL /D _MBCS /Gm- /EHsc /MT /GS /fp:precise /Zc:wchar_t /Zc:forScope /Zc:inline /GR- /Fo"msvc19\\Release - Left 4 Dead\\" /Fd"msvc19\Release - Left 4 Dead\vc142.pdb" /external:env:EXTERNAL_INCLUDE /external:W3 /Gd /TP /analyze- /FC /errorReport:prompt /MP /D SE_EPISODEONE=1 /D SE_DARKMESSIAH=2 /D SE_ORANGEBOX=3 /D SE_BLOODYGOODTIME=4 /D SE_EYE=5 /D SE_CSS=6 /D SE_HL2DM=7 /D SE_DODS=8 /D SE_TF2=9 /D SE_LEFT4DEAD=10 /D SE_NUCLEARDAWN=11 /D SE_LEFT4DEAD2=12 /D SE_ALIENSWARM=13 /D SE_PORTAL2=14 /D SE_CSGO=15 /D SE_DOTA=16 extension.cpp sdk\smsdk_ext.cpp
```

```batch
link.exe /ERRORREPORT:PROMPT /OUT:"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\my-own\experiment_ext\msvc19\Release - Left 4 Dead\experiment.ext.2.l4d.dll" /INCREMENTAL:NO /NOLOGO /LIBPATH:"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\lib\public" "C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\lib\public\tier0.lib" "C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\lib\public\tier1.lib" "C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\sdk\hl2sdk-l4d\lib\public\vstdlib.lib" legacy_stdio_definitions.lib kernel32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib winspool.lib comdlg32.lib advapi32.lib shell32.lib ole32.lib oleaut32.lib uuid.lib odbc32.lib odbccp32.lib /NODEFAULTLIB:LIBC /NODEFAULTLIB:LIBCD /NODEFAULTLIB:LIBCMTD /MANIFEST /MANIFESTUAC:"level='asInvoker' uiAccess='false'" /manifest:embed /DEBUG /PDB:"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\my-own\experiment_ext\msvc19\Release - Left 4 Dead\experiment.ext.2.l4d.pdb" /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /OPT:REF /OPT:ICF /LTCG:incremental /LTCGOUT:"msvc19\Release - Left 4 Dead\experiment.ext.2.l4d.iobj" /TLBID:1 /DYNAMICBASE:NO /IMPLIB:"C:\Users\Dartz\Desktop\mods\source\my-own\experiment_ext\msvc19\Release - Left 4 Dead\experiment.ext.2.l4d.lib" /MACHINE:X86 /SAFESEH /DLL "msvc19\Release - Left 4 Dead\extension.obj" "msvc19\Release - Left 4 Dead\smsdk_ext.obj"
```
